body: I hope with marnie arriving in the anime,we can have a pm gals galar girls with ash,marnie,bea and sonia
I hope someone translate this one PM gals is so good

After some time, we got a new instalment on this series. Man, this series is so old, I believe that it started before the anime version of black and white, and the quality never dropped, not even a inch. I love how Jun adapt the characters and deal with their relationship, their art is great too.

Aw YISS
At last, Ash Musou series continuation.
